value:
$WmMPID_ネイミー,ch08_29_Namy_F_Normal,Face|I'm Neimi. I've learned a little
of archery. I hope it will be
helpful to you.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|My sincere apologies, Prince Xander.
It seems I've brought you on another
long journey to a fruitless land.$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|You needn't worry. Princess Veronica
requested I accompany you, so it is
my pleasure, of course.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Thank you, Prince Xander. You've
managed to give her the support
I always wished I were able to.$k$pEven if something were to happen
to me, I know that I can trust that
she will be safe with you beside her.$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|Please. You are her only brother.
You cannot be replaced so easily!$k$p...So, what shall we do now?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|We keep going. No matter how
long it takes. No matter the cost...$k$pI must find a way to break the curse
of Embla's blood.$k$p$Sbs150|
